Package simulation.montecarlo

Class SimulationCheckpointer

java.lang.Object
simulation.montecarlo.SimulationCheckpointer
public class SimulationCheckpointer extends Object
Saves and loads a checkpoint that can be used to restart the simulation if stopped or crashed

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    folderName
    Name of the directory where the checkpoint file will be saved

    fSaveState

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulationCheckpointer

      public SimulationCheckpointer​(String folderName, int Lx, int Lz, double extBx, boolean suppressInternalTransFields, long seed)
      Constructs a new checkpointer object used to save and load simulation checkpoints
      Parameters:
      folderName - name of the directory where the checkpoint file is saved
      Lx - number of unit cells in the x and y directions
      Lz - number of unit cells in the z direction
      extBx - external magnetic field in the x direction
      suppressInternalTransFields - whether to suppress internal transverse fields (exclude offdiagonal dipolar terms)
      seed - random number generator seed

  • Method Details

    • readCheckpoint

      public MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation readCheckpoint()
      Reads the checkpoint file of a simulation
      Returns:
      MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation object read from the file or null if reading was unsuccessful

    • writeCheckpoint

      public void writeCheckpoint​(MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Writes a checkpoint file of a simulation, which can be used to start the simulation again from this point
      Parameters:
      simulation - the simulation object whose state is to be saved to the checkpoint file

    • verifyCheckpointCompatibility

      public static String verifyCheckpointCompatibility​(double[] T, boolean parallelTemperingOff, char parallelMode, double spinSize, double tol, double J_ex, long seed, boolean[] dilution, MonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Verify that a given simulation is compatible with the given parameters. Should be used to verify compatibility of command line arguments with simulation retrieved from checkpoint.
      Parameters:
      T - Array of temperatures. for single temperature simulation a size 1 array should be given.
      parallelTemperingOff - whether to turn off parallel tempering (never swap temperatures)
      parallelMode - run mode: 's' for serial and 'p' for parallel
      spinSize - Typical magnetic moment based on the external transverse field
      tol - tolerance for convergence of self-consistent calculation
      J_ex - Exchange interaction parameter
      seed - random number generator seed
      dilution - boolean array that indicates which spins exist (true) and which are diluted (false)
      simulation - simulation whose compatibility with the other given arguments is to be checked
      Returns:
      a string containing the incompatibilities between checkpoint parameters and current parameters. if empty, that means it's compatible.

    • verifyDilutionCompatibility

      public static boolean verifyDilutionCompatibility​(boolean[] dilution, MonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Verify the compatibility of a dilution structure with that of the given simulation.
      Parameters:
      dilution - boolean array that indicates which spins exist (true) and which are diluted (false)
      simulation - simulation object to compare with the given dilution array for incompatibilities
      Returns:
      whether the simulation's dilution is compatible with the given dilution array (true=compatible)

    • verifySeedCompatibility

      public static boolean verifySeedCompatibility​(long seed, MonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Verify the compatibility of a seed with that of the given simulation.
      Parameters:
      seed - random number generator seed
      simulation - simulation object to compare with the given seed for incompatibility
      Returns:
      whether the simulation's seed is compatible with the given seed (true=compatible)

    • verifyJexCompatibility

      public static boolean verifyJexCompatibility​(double J_ex, MonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Verify the compatibility of an exchange parameter with that of the given simulation.
      Parameters:
      J_ex - Exchange interaction parameter
      simulation - simulation object to compare with the given Exchange parameter for incompatibility
      Returns:
      whether the simulation's exchange parameter is compatible with the given J_ex (true=compatible)

    • verifySpinSizeCompatibility

      public static boolean verifySpinSizeCompatibility​(double spinSize, MonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Verify the compatibility of a given spinSize with that of the given simulation.
      Parameters:
      spinSize - Typical magnetic moment based on the external transverse field
      simulation - simulation object to compare with the given spinSize for incompatibility
      Returns:
      whether the simulation's spinSize is compatible with the given spinSize (true=compatible)

    • verifyTolCompatibility

      public static boolean verifyTolCompatibility​(double tol, MonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Verify the compatibility of a given tolerance with that of the given simulation.
      Parameters:
      tol - tolerance for convergence of self-consistent calculation
      simulation - simulation object to compare with the given tolerance for incompatibility
      Returns:
      whether the simulation's tolerance is compatible with the given tol (true=compatible)

    • verifyTemperaturesCompatibility

      public static boolean verifyTemperaturesCompatibility​(double[] T, MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Verify the compatibility of a given temperature array with that of the given simulation.
      Parameters:
      T - array of temperatures
      simulation - simulation object to compare with the given temperature array for incompatibilities
      Returns:
      whether the simulation's temperature array is compatible with the given T[] (true=compatible)

    • verifySingleTemperatureCompatibility

      public static boolean verifySingleTemperatureCompatibility​(double T, SingleTMonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Verify the compatibility of a given temperature with that of the given simulation.
      Parameters:
      T - temperature
      simulation - simulation object to compare with the given temperature for incompatibility
      Returns:
      whether the simulation's temperature is compatible with the given T (true=compatible)

    • verifyParallelTemperingCompatibility

      public static boolean verifyParallelTemperingCompatibility​(boolean parallelTemperingOff, MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Verify the compatibility of a given parallel tempering switch with that of the given simulation.
      Parameters:
      parallelTemperingOff - whether to turn off parallel tempering (never swap temperatures)
      simulation - simulation object to compare with the given parallel tempering option for incompatibility
      Returns:
      whether the simulation's parallel tempering is compatible with the given PT option (true=compatible)

    • verifyNumOfTemperaturesCompatibility

      public static boolean verifyNumOfTemperaturesCompatibility​(char parallelMode, MonteCarloSimulation simulation)
      Verify the compatibility of a given parallel mode with that of the given simulation.
      Parameters:
      parallelMode - run mode: 't' for single temperature, 's' or 'p' for multiple temperatures.
      simulation - simulation object to compare with the given parallel mode option for incompatibility
      Returns:
      whether the simulation is of the correct class, compatible with the given parallel mode (true=compatible)
